predicate.note: Frames file for 'jeopardize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with threaten.

example.name: normal usage
example.text: The Conservatives don't dare jeopardize marginal Tory seats in Coventry, where Jaguar has headquarters...
example.arg: marginal Tory seats in Coventry , where Jaguar has headquarters
